eu.trentorise.opendata.josman

Class DirWalker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.io.DirectoryWalker
      • eu.trentorise.opendata.josman.DirWalker

  • @Immutable
public class DirWalker
extends org.apache.commons.io.DirectoryWalker
    Copies directory to destination and converts md files to html.
    Author:
    David Leoni

              int depth,
              Collection results)
